about_the_game:
With this DLC you will receive the following contents.

1. The main character's maximum level can now be increased by 300.
2. New Plans available within the game.
3. New quests and Coliseum battles will be added.

*To get the above the Coliseum must be available.
*Additional dungeons must be unlocked with Plans for the quest.
detailed_description:
With this DLC you will receive the following contents.

1. The main character's maximum level can now be increased by 300.
2. New Plans available within the game.
3. New quests and Coliseum battles will be added.

*To get the above the Coliseum must be available.
*Additional dungeons must be unlocked with Plans for the quest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 32 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.

short_description: This package includes additional new quests and Coliseum battles.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
